participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.background: mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i'm in the third grade.

participant_2.background: i'm an animal activist. my age is too old to say. i spend my time bird watching with my cats. the holidays make me depressed. i have rainbow hair.
